items.sentence: Tom couldn't find a bottle opener, so he tried to open the bottle with his teeth.
The train was derailed and about thirty passengers were either killed or injured.
The seaside resort was so touristy that it actually stood up and walked to Vegas.
Just looking through the windows, you could tell the house belonged to a hoarder.
Tom went swimming in the river, but when he got out, his clothes had been stolen.
